name: nosto-checkout
title: Nosto Checkout
description: Provides Nosto placements management (https://nosto.com) on checkout.

enableNosto.title: Enable Nosto on Checkout
enableNosto.description: If disabled, Nosto will not be loaded and placements will not be created on checkout.

belowCartPlacementId.title: Placement below cart
belowCartPlacementId.description: Nosto placement ID for area below checkout cart. If empty, the placement will not be created.

belowSummaryPlacementId.title: Placement below summary
belowSummaryPlacementId.description: Nosto placement ID for area below checkout summary. If empty, the placement will not be created.
